description:
As the finer points of the prospective merger between Shiota and Namidome Industries get hammered out, a potential root cause of the giant beast mutation is finally discovered.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Susumu Gappei Keikaku! Akiraka ni Naru Shiota no Sakuryaku to, Kyojuu Hassei no Gen`in... Dou Suru Namidome!?
The Merger Draws Near! Shiota`s Plot, and the Origin of the Giant Beasts, Are Both Revealed! What Will Namidome Do?
進む合併計画! 明らかになる塩田の策略と, 巨獣発生の原因... どうする波止!?
